input.sentences: the costume party was off to a great start .
not everyone was there for the costumes though ...
there was some amazing face paint there .
as well as an amazing plummer costume .
everyone had a great time that night .
output.sentences: At the start of the party, we took some photographs of the costume.
After several minutes though, some of the costumes were gone.
However, there were still some people in amazing costumes covered in green paint.
One of the people still in costume was an amazing plummer.
I had the best time of my life that night.
